sec.p: Blue and great tits have similar nesting biology as they lay one egg per day, with incubation periods of 13 days 30. The great tit is larger (17–21 g) than the blue tit (7–11 g). The two species widely use nest-boxes provided for nesting (e.g., refs 19, 30 and 36). As noted above, both species forage on similar prey items.
